duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and maintain PostgreSQL and Oracle databases to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
Develop and implement automated processes for software development and database administration tasks.
Analyze complex issues related to database performance and design effective solutions to address them.
Influence senior IT stakeholders and business partners to adopt best practices and technologies in database administration.
Communicate technical concepts to non-technical audiences in an understandable manner.
Translate client needs into database products and services to meet their requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
